VIEW_SOURCE: CREATE ALGORITHM=UNDEFINED DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` SQL SECURITY DEFINER VIEW `v1_perencanaan_persediaan` AS select `aa`.`ref_idkegiatan` AS `ref_idkegiatan`,`aa`.`Id` AS `Id`,`aa`.`c` AS `c`,`aa`.`d` AS `d`,`aa`.`e` AS `e`,`aa`.`tahun_anggaran` AS `tahun_anggaran`,`aa`.`f` AS `f`,`aa`.`g` AS `g`,`aa`.`h` AS `h`,`aa`.`i` AS `i`,`aa`.`j` AS `j`,`aa`.`k` AS `k`,`aa`.`l` AS `l`,`aa`.`m` AS `m`,`aa`.`n` AS `n`,`aa`.`o` AS `o`,`aa`.`jml_rencana` AS `jml_rencana`,`aa`.`satuan` AS `satuan`,`aa`.`harga_rencana` AS `harga_rencana`,`aa`.`keterangan` AS `keterangan`,`aa`.`status` AS `status`,`aa`.`sttemp` AS `sttemp`,`aa`.`tgl_update` AS `tgl_update`,`bb`.`nama_barang` AS `nama_barang`,`cc`.`nama_merk` AS `nama_merk`,`dd`.`nama_satuan` AS `nama_satuan`,`aa`.`merk` AS `merk`,`aa`.`type` AS `type`,`aa`.`spesifikasi` AS `spesifikasi` from (((`perencanaan_persediaan` `aa` left join `ref_barang_persediaan` `bb` on(((`aa`.`f` = `bb`.`f`) and (`aa`.`g` = `bb`.`g`)))) left join `ref_merk_persediaan` `cc` on((`aa`.`h` = `cc`.`h`))) left join `ref_satuan_persediaan` `dd` on((`aa`.`satuan` = `dd`.`Id`)))
